title: Was Obama Silent on Shooting of Republicans, Reemerging Only to Praise a Drug Dealer?
subtitle: The former president called Republican Sen. Jeff Flake to give his best wishes to those targeted in the Virginia shooting, and also recorded a speech honoring musician Jay Z's induction into the Songwriters Hall of Fame.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Former President Barack Obama was silent on a shooting that targeted Republican congressmen but praised a former drug dealer.
